heroTitle: Find job offers that match your preferences
heroSubtitle1: Finding the best suited job has never been easier!
heroSubtitle2: Want to give it a try?
featureSectionItem1Subtile: Precise search based on your interests, skills and abilities allows us to select only the most suitable offers for you.
featureSectionItem2Subtile: We have tried to simplify the search process so that it is straightforward, intuitive, and leads you directly to the specific location.
featureSectionItem3Subtile: We search for offers from the largest portals, which significantly increases your chances of finding a job.
howWorksSectionItem1Subtitle: With StudentWorkHub, you can browse offers from the largest job portals.
howWorksSectionItem2Subtitle: After creating an account, you will gain access to all the app's features like search and ranking.
howWorksSectionItem3Subtitle: Artificial intelligence and ranking algorithms will allow you to find only the most accurate offers.
